#summary how the redtamarin is organized.

== Introduction ==

Because the [http://hg.mozilla.org/tamarin-central tamarin-central] and [http://hg.mozilla.org/tamarin-redux tamarin-redux] repositories use [http://mercurial.selenic.com/ Mercurial] and that we prefer to work with Subversion
we need to have a special setup.

On another google project [http://code.google.com/p/redshell/ redshell] we sync every week with the tamarin-redux repository, here why:
 * we want to use google code
 * it allow us to send back back patches to the Tamarin project
 * it allow us to semi-automate an `hg archive + svn commit`

So, each week (in general every sunday), we override this path [http://redtamarin.googlecode.com/svn/tamarin-redux/ /svn/tamarin-redux] with the content of redshell.

Also, we need to be in sync with ASC (ActionScript Compiler)<br>
so we're checking a subpath of the [http://opensource.adobe.com/wiki/display/flexsdk/Flex+SDK Adobe Flex SDK]<br>
[http://opensource.adobe.com/svn/opensource/flex/sdk/trunk/modules/asc /modules/asc]

== Project structure ==

here what you will obtain after a checkout
{{{

  ..
   |_ .gclient
   |_ redtamarin
           |_ build
           |     |_ ...
           |
           |_ build.xml
           |_ changelog.txt
           |_ DEPS
           |_ license.txt
           |_ src
               |_ asc
               |   |_ ...                             <- */trunk/modules/asc (Flex SDK)
               |
               |_ tamarin                         <- /redtamarin-root/ (eg. single files configure.py, manifest.mk, etc.)
                   |_ api
                   |   |_ clib                  <- /api/clib/trunk/
                   |
                   |_ as3
                   |   |_ avmglue         <- */platform/avmglue/trunk/src/ (maashaack)
                   |   |_ clib                  <- */platform/clib/trunk/src/ (maashaack)
                   |
                   |_ axscript                  <- /tamarin-redux/axscript/
                   |_ build                       <- /tamarin-redux/build/
                   |_ configure.py              
                   |_ core                        <- /tamarin-redux/core/
                   |_ doc                         <- /tamarin-redux/doc/
                   |_ Doxyfile                  
                   |_ esc                         <- /tamarin-redux/esc/
                   |_ eval                        <- /tamarin-redux/eval/
                   |_ extensions            <- /trunk/extensions/
                   |_ localization           <- /tamarin-redux/localization/
                   |_ manifest.mk             
                   |_ MMgc               <- /tamarin-redux/MMgc/
                   |_ nanojit            <- /tamarin-redux/nanojit/
                   |_ other-licenses     <- /tamarin-redux/other-licenses/
                   |_ pcre               <- /tamarin-redux/pcre/
                   |_ platform           <- /trunk/platform/
                   |_ shell              <- /trunk/shell/
                   |_ tests              <- /tamarin-redux/tests/
                   |_ utils                <- /tamarin-redux/utils/
                   |_ VMPI                <- /trunk/VMPI/
                   |_ vprof               <- /tamarin-redux/vprof/

}}}
